PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-02692024-03-25AAFC
ActAgricultural Marketing Programs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Agricultural Marketing Programs Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the AGRICULTURAL MARKETING PROGRAMS REGULATIONS in order to temporarily increase the interest-free loan limit under the Advance Payments Program from $100,000 to $250,000 for all eligible agricultural producers for the 2024 program year.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0053 Publication Date: 2024-04-10
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the AGRICULTURAL MARKETING PROGRAMS REGULATIONS in order to temporarily increase the interest-free loan limit under the Advance Payments Program from $100,000 to $250,000 for all eligible agricultural producers for the 2024 program year.
